title: Has Harden Lost A Step?
description:
Jalen Rose and David Jacoby use their podcast exclusive time to debate if the NBA should vote on the MVP after the postseason and if James Harden has lost a step.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
